amendatorysection.catchline: District or company; notice prior to meeting; requirements.
amendatorysection.para: Any irrigation district, reclamation district, public power and irrigation district, rural water district, or mutual irrigation or canal company intending to file an application for transfer and a map with the department under section 46-2,122 shall give notice prior to the meeting at which the application and map will be approved for filing. Notice shall be given in the manner provided in section 46-2,128.
